name: Brown Flying School, Inc.
about: Brown Flying School, Inc., based at the Sky King Airport in Terre Haute, Indiana, has been a stalwart in the flight training industry for over 60 years. Specializing in one-on-one flight training, we offer programs tailored to help students earn their Private Pilot Certificate and Instrument Rating at their own pace. With a long-standing partnership training pilots for Indiana State University for over 40 years, our experienced instructors provide personalized attention to ensure each student achieves their aviation goals. As a Part 61 Flight School, we are committed to delivering high-quality training in a supportive and professional environment. Whether you are a novice or an experienced pilot, Brown Flying School is dedicated to helping you soar to new heights.
